name: Pocky Moon Snap
description:
A small game made with Godot Game Engine

You play as Zenithor, the universe's greatest investigative journalist. Your mission: capture evidence of the rumored "pocky moonings" - whatever that means - for your next big story.

When the pocky sticks moon you, snap a photo. Collect enough evidence to make your editors happy. But be quick! You're on a tight schedule.
